# Keyboard Map

Get more information by reading [tmk_keyboard](https://github.com/tmk/tmk_keyboard/wiki#build-firmware)

## Installation
HHKB with hasu's [bluetooth controller](https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=71517.0), also this: https://sspai.com/post/45539

Flash your firmware:https://github.com/tmk/tmk_keyboard/wiki#build-firmware

My keyboard map is unimap.hex in this fold, which display by gui is:
[link](http://www.tmk-kbd.com/tmk_keyboard/editor/unimap/?hhkb_rn42#)
